alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 7:32PM CDT until March 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saint Francis River at Lake City For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 10.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
